name: Query Rapid ILS Print Monos
query: SELECT distinct identifiers.identifier AS oclc, instances.instance_id, instances.title AS title, items.effective_location_name AS location, items.effective_call_number AS call_number, pub.date_of_publication AS pub_date FROM folio_reporting.instance_identifiers identifiers inner join folio_reporting.instance_ext instances on identifiers.instance_id = instances.instance_id inner join folio_reporting.holdings_ext holdings on instances.instance_id = holdings.instance_id inner join folio_reporting.item_ext items on holdings.holdings_id = items.holdings_record_id inner join folio_reporting.instance_publication pub on instances.instance_id = pub.instance_id WHERE identifiers.identifier_type_name = 'OCLC' AND instances.mode_of_issuance_name IN('single unit','multipart monograph') AND items.material_type_name = 'unmediated -- volume' AND instances.type_name = 'text' AND instances.discovery_suppress = 'f' AND holdings.discovery_suppress = 'f' AND items.effective_location_name IN ('Evans stk') ORDER BY oclc, title, location, call_number
